DOC.brief_summary: Pathological comparisons of surgical open lung biopsies and cryobiopsies in non-IPF ILD. Patients with non-IPF ILD eligible for an open lung biopsy will undergo cryobiopsy in the same time. Between observers agreement will be assessed for each pairs of samples.
DOC.brief_title: Pathological Comparisons of Surgical Open Lung Biopsies and Cryobiopsies in Non-IPF ILD
DOC.criteria: Non IPF ILD eligible for surgical lung biopsy reviewed during multidisciplinary approach Ineligible for lung biopsy: pulmonary hypertension, coagulation deficiency, FEV<11, giant emphysematous bullae, hemodynamic instability severe hypoxia, general anesthetic ineligibility
